isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE / 2000 4000 and 8000 MODELS BUILT OCTOBER 1, 1998 AND AFTER - ALLISON 2000 SERIES™ (LCT) TRANSMISSION ELECTRONIC CONTROLS - ELECTRICAL OPERATION - VEHICLE SPEED SIGNAL FROM TCM

svcproc.title: VEHICLE SPEED SIGNAL FROM TCM
svcproc.para: Vehicle speed signal information, from the TCM, is transmitted on circuit 126, 126A and 126B from grey TCM connector (3031) pin 26. The signal on circuit 126A or 126B (depending on model) is sent through connector (303) pin A to circuit 47 of in-line controller connector (379) terminal 39. The signal on circuit 126B or 126A (depending on model) is sent to body I/O connector (3032) terminal D.
